scripts.local:env: bash -c 'if [ -z "$1" ]; then echo "❌ Error: missing token argument" >&2; exit 1; fi; TOKEN="$1"; echo -e "ZITADEL_API_URL=http://localhost:8080\nZITADEL_SERVICE_USER_TOKEN=$TOKEN\nEMAIL_VERIFICATION=true" > apps/login/.env.local && echo "✅ apps/login/.env.local created"' _
scripts.packages:build: pnpm run packages:proto:generate && pnpm run packages:client:build
scripts.clean:all: nx clean && pnpm run clean:upstream && rm -rf .nx node_modules
